      • acquireWakeLock

        public boolean acquireWakeLock()
        Acquires the wake lock.
        Prevent the device going to sleep mode so that your application can discover iBeacon when the screen is turned off.
        You need call releaseWakeLock() when you are done and don't need the lock anymore.
        返回:

      • releaseWakeLock

        public boolean releaseWakeLock()
        Release the wake lock.
        返回:

      • setForegroundScanPeriod

        public void setForegroundScanPeriod(long periodMills)
        Set iBeacon scan period (in milliseconds) in foreground
        参数:
        periodMills - Default value is 1.1 s(unit:ms)

      • setForegroundBetweenScanPeriod

        public void setForegroundBetweenScanPeriod(long periodMills)
        Set the period (in milliseconds) between two scan periods in foreground
        参数:
        periodMills - Default value is 0 s(unit:ms)

      • setBackgroundScanPeriod

        public void setBackgroundScanPeriod(long periodMills)
        set iBeaon scan period (in milliseconds) in background
        参数:
        periodMills - Default value is 10 s(unit:ms)

      • setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod

        public void setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod(long periodMills)
        Set the period (in milliseconds) between two scan periods in background
        参数:
        periodMills - Default value is 5 min(unit:ms)

        public boolean addBroadcastKey(java.lang.String broadcastKey)
        Add a broadcast key to decrypt a Yunzi with encryption.
        If you have more keys, you can call this method more than once.
        参数:
        broadcastKey -
        返回:
